text: Teacher told us a story involving nudes and jail time For some reason this memory just popped up in my head so I decided to post about it  A while ago one of my teachers told the class a story so here it is My teacher was always at the school early because he was the football coach and the team had early practice  After practice athletes would forget some bags or equipment or something and come back to get it  This one particular time he was chilling with the assistant coach when one of the students walked in  they paid no attention because it s a common occurrence  Some time passed and my teacher had to set up for class so he headed out  and that s when he saw it  Dozens of printed out pictures of nudes on the walls  He had to team up with the assistant coach to take them down before the students showed up  After that I m pretty sure they caught the dude that did it trying to leave campus  his bag was full of a bunch more pictures  His motive  His girlfriend cheated on him with one of his teammates so he printed out her nudes for everyone to see  the thing is though  he was   and the girl was  well not   so you can guess what happens
summary: Teacher told his class a story involving nudes and jail time. His girlfriend cheated on him with one of his football players and he printed out her nudes for everyone to see. He had to team up with the assistant coach to take them down before the students showed up.
